column4: UAW says it will greet Tesla workers with 'open arms'
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/DETROIT The United Automobile Workers union on Friday said it had been approached by workers at Tesla Inc's  Fremont  California  assembly plant  rejecting a charge by the chief executive of the luxury electric car maker that a worker who publicly criticized the company was on the UAW payroll.

column4: UPDATE 4-UAW says it will greet Tesla workers with 'open arms'
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/DETROIT Feb 10 The United Automobile Workers union on Friday said it had been approached by workers at Tesla Inc's Fremont  California  assembly plant  rejecting a charge by the chief executive of the luxury electric car maker that a worker who publicly criticized the company was on the UAW payroll.
